In the Folder Pane, when I select "Size" column to be displayed, that column is not indented to the right edge of the header in question, but rather to the far left edge of the pane.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the MailNews application and input your account information.
2. From the Folder Pane, click on the "Click to select columns to display" icon and select "Size".

Actual Results:  
"x KB" is indented to the far left edge of the pane.

Expected Results:  
"x KB" should be indented to the right edge of the "Size" column.
